item.title: 马来西亚押注榴莲之旅与野生动物资源，延续旅游业繁荣
item.description: 通往布鲁皮榴莲园的车程并非普通车辆所能驾驭。这条狭窄崎岖的小径蜿蜒穿过马来西亚中部偏远的山丘，载着游客穿越黏腻的热浪与茂密的树林。【原文：The drive up to Bloopy Durians’ orchard isn’t for ordinary cars. The narrow, rutted track snakes across the remote hills of central Malaysia, taking visitors through sticky heat and dense trees.】

item.title: 稀土矿商莱纳斯业绩激增，但未达预期
item.description: 莱纳斯稀土公司报告称，截至去年12月底的六个月内，其利润大幅增长，这得益于产量提升及其主要产品价格上涨，但仍低于分析师预期——此前全球对金属供应链的关注已推高了市场预期。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. reported a surge in profit for the six months to the end of December, on the back of stronger production and improved prices for its main product, but fell short of analyst expectations heightened by the global focus on metal supply chains.】

item.title: 动量中游公司正寻求出售，交易可能价值50亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，EnCap Flatrock Midstream正考虑以超过50亿美元的价格出售天然气管道公司Momentum Midstream。【原文：EnCap Flatrock Midstream is considering a sale of gas pipeline company Momentum Midstream for over $5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望攀升，英伟达提振市场情绪：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周四有望上涨，受华尔街转为看涨情绪提振。英伟达公司发布乐观展望后，美股在收盘后延续涨势。【原文：Asian equities looked set to advance Thursday, buoyed by a bullish turn on Wall Street which gained momentum after the closing bell from an upbeat outlook by Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 优选公司称柯克兰退出证明华尔街存在"卡特尔"
item.description: 优选通信公司表示，一家顶级律所因受到阿波罗全球管理公司、阿瑞斯管理公司、橡树资本管理公司等机构的压力而退出其代理业务，这表明这些机构正在参与针对该公司的卡特尔行为。【原文：Optimum Communications Inc. said a top law firm’s withdrawal from representing it under pressure from Apollo Global Management, Ares Management, Oaktree Capital Management and others showed that they were participating in a cartel against it.】

item.title: C3.ai在首席执行官交接后将裁员26%
item.description: 数据分析软件制造商C3.ai公司任命新任首席执行官后，正裁减约四分之一员工。【原文：C3.ai Inc., a maker of data analysis software, is cutting about a quarter of its workforce after the appointment of a new chief executive officer.】

item.title: Zoom下调盈利预期，全力拓展产品组合
item.description: Zoom通信公司发布的盈利预期低于分析师预期，这表明在积极推广其扩展产品套件的同时，该公司面临着更高的成本压力。【原文：Zoom Communications Inc. gave a profit outlook that fell short of analysts’ estimates, suggesting higher costs for the company while it aggressively pitches its expanded suite of products.】

item.title: 蓝星钢铁称修订后的收购要约不足，但愿意接受交易
item.description: 澳大利亚蓝星钢铁有限公司表示，钢铁动力公司和SGH有限公司提出的修订后收购要约低估了该公司价值，但仍对更优报价持开放态度。【原文：Australia’s BlueScope Steel Ltd. said a revised bid from Steel Dynamics Inc. and SGH Ltd. undervalues the company, but remains open to a better offer.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称关税不确定性风险恐阻碍美国经济"强劲增长"
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，围绕美国全面加征关税的动荡局势，可能削弱原本"强劲"的经济增长势头。【原文：Turmoil around sweeping US tariffs risks undercutting what’s otherwise a “buoyant” economy, the International Monetary Fund said.】

item.title: Snowflake营收展望未能打动投资者
item.description: 雪花公司公布的季度销售预期符合市场预期，令投资者感到失望。这些投资者原本期待更强劲的表现，以消除对人工智能时代软件行业生存能力的担忧。【原文：Snowflake Inc. gave an outlook for quarterly sales that was in line with estimates, disappointing investors who were looking for a stronger showing to overcome jitters about the software industry’s viability in the age of AI.】

item.title: 交易员押注1400万美元：华纳竞购失败反而会成为奈飞的胜利
item.description: 一位期权交易员似乎押注近1400万美元，认为若奈飞公司收购华纳兄弟探索公司的计划失败，该公司反而会获益。【原文：An options trader appears to be betting almost $14 million that Netflix Inc. will win should it lose out on its bid to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.】

item.title: 英伟达乐观的销售预测表明人工智能热潮依然强劲
item.description: 全球市值最高的企业英伟达公司再次给出乐观的季度营收预测，表明大规模的人工智能计算建设仍在按计划推进。【原文：Nvidia Corp., the world’s most valuable company, gave another bullish quarterly revenue forecast, signaling that the massive build-out of AI computing remains on track.】

item.title: Nubank的人工智能模型助力净利息收入增长
item.description: Nu Holdings Ltd.的信贷利润率在第四季度有所提升，这家拉丁美洲最大的金融科技公司扩大了人工智能驱动的信贷模型的应用范围。【原文：Nu Holdings Ltd.’s credit margins increased in the fourth quarter, as Latin America’s largest fintech expanded its use of a credit model powered by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Salesforce营收预期令人失望，加剧人工智能行业忧虑
item.description: Salesforce公司对新财年的销售增长前景给出了不温不火的预期，加剧了华尔街对这家软件巨头在人工智能时代将败给新竞争对手的担忧。【原文：Salesforce Inc. gave a lukewarm outlook for sales growth in the new fiscal year, fueling Wall Street’s worries that the software giant will lose out to new competitors in the age of AI.】

item.title: AMD将斥资1.5亿美元认购Nutanix股票，建立全新合作伙伴关系
item.description: 超微半导体公司将斥资1.5亿美元收购Nutanix公司股票，作为新合作协议的一部分，该协议还包括联合工程和销售合作。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. will buy $150 million in Nutanix Inc. stock as part of a new partnership that also includes joint engineering and sales efforts.】

item.title: 全球基金涌向澳大利亚债券避险，人工智能热潮出现动摇
item.description: 投资者正蜂拥涌入澳大利亚债券市场，这个全球最安全、收益率最高的主权债务市场为那些逃离人工智能恐慌交易的投资者提供了避风港。【原文：Investors are piling into Australian bonds as one of the world’s safest and highest-yielding sovereign debt markets offers shelter to those fleeing an AI scare trade.】

item.title: 华尔街对人工智能已不知所措
item.description: 过去一年左右，华尔街经历了多轮与人工智能相关的抛售浪潮，其导火索从对中国更具成本效益的竞争的担忧，到对人工智能泡沫即将破裂的忧虑不一而足。而本周的市场下跌，或许是首次部分源于一部自费出版的小说。【原文：Over the past year or so, Wall Street has gone through waves of AI-related selloffs, sparked by fears about everything from more cost-efficient competition in China to the likelihood of a looming AI bubble. This week’s market dip may have been the first partly caused by a self-published work of fiction.】

item.title: 华尔街对人工智能已不知所措
item.description: 投资者正努力预测人工智能将对整体经济产生何种影响。【原文：Investors are struggling to predict the impact that AI will have on the wider economy.】

item.title: 红杉资本林文杰表示：软件公司将挺过人工智能浪潮
item.description: 红杉资本合伙人林文杰表示，软件公司将挺过当前人工智能浪潮带来的颠覆。【原文：Software companies will make it through the current wave of artificial intelligence disruption, said Alfred Lin, a co-steward and partner at Sequoia Capital.】

item.title: 杰富瑞基金因First Brands破产遭投资者起诉
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团因其持有的第一品牌集团股份导致投资者亏损，遭到旗下某基金的投资者起诉。第一品牌集团是一家已破产的汽车零部件供应商，据称是涉及数十亿美元欺诈计划的核心企业。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. was sued by investors in one of its funds over losses related to its holdings in First Brands Group, a now-bankrupt auto parts supplier at the heart of an alleged multibillion-dollar fraud scheme.】

item.title: 纽瓦克机场将于今春测试自动驾驶接驳巴士
item.description: 纽瓦克自由国际机场将于今年春季开始测试自动驾驶接驳巴士，该巴士将往返于机场备受期待的新建铁路系统与航站楼之间，为旅客提供接驳服务。【原文：Newark Liberty International Airport will start testing self-driving shuttle buses that could haul passengers between the airport’s long-awaited new train system and terminals in the spring.】

item.title: 直觉机器公司股价暴跌，此前完成1.75亿美元配售
item.description: 直觉机器公司股价暴跌，此前这家航天企业宣布获得1.75亿美元战略股权投资，用于支持包括拓展轨道数据中心技术在内的多个项目。【原文：Intuitive Machines Inc. shares plunged after the space company announced a $175 million strategic equity investment to support projects such as an expansion into technology for orbital data centers.】

item.title: 交易员涌入看跌人民币押注以对冲下行风险
item.description: 交易员们将人民币空头押注推升至4月以来最高水平，旨在防范人民币强劲反弹后的下行风险，并为人民币即将进入传统疲软期做好准备。【原文：Traders have boosted bearish wagers on the yuan to the highest since April, looking to protect against downside risks in the wake of a strong rally and ahead of a period of traditional weakness in the Chinese currency.】

item.title: 软件风险敞口仅2%的BDC自诩为"避风港"
item.description: 随着对软件公司贷款的担忧持续加剧，某私募信贷基金因未涉足该领域而自称是相对的"避风港"。【原文：As concerns continue to mount about loans to software companies, one private credit fund is calling itself a relative “safe haven” due to lack of exposure.】

item.title: 橡树资本正考虑出售英国财富管理公司Utmost，或进行20亿英镑IPO
item.description: 知情人士透露，橡树资本管理公司正为英国保险财富管理解决方案提供商Utmost Group Plc探索多种方案，包括出售及在伦敦首次公开募股。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is exploring options for Utmost Group Plc, a UK-based provider of insurance-based wealth management solutions, including a sale and an initial public offering in London, according to people familiar with matter.】

item.title: 美国银行因担忧NFL续约问题双重下调福克斯股票评级
item.description: 美国国家橄榄球联盟对美国观众的吸引力持续增强，这可能给福克斯公司带来麻烦——尤其是在双方重返谈判桌之际。这是该股票唯一看空者的观点。【原文：The National Football League’s grip on US audiences keeps growing and that could spell trouble for Fox Corp. when it comes back to the negotiating table, according to the stock’s lone bear.】

item.title: 美联储的博斯蒂克称对独立性的质疑是重大关切
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔·博斯蒂克周三发表告别文章，表达了他对美国民众开始质疑央行独立性的担忧，并强调这一立场需要得到维护。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic published a farewell essay Wednesday in which he aired his concern that Americans have started to question the central bank’s independence, a position that needs to be safeguarded.】
